Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.abstract: Returns all the history changes given a NSPersistentHistoryChangeRequest request.

Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.name: deleteHistory()

Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.abstract: Deletes all history before a given date.

Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.name: deleteHistory(before:)
Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.abstract: Deletes all history before a given token.

Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.abstract: Deletes all history before a given transaction.

Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.name: persistentStores

Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.name: setMetaDataObject(_:with:for:completion:)

Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.name: entity(forEntityName:)

Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.name: fetchNSArray(_:)

Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.name: newChildContext(concurrencyType:)
Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.abstract: Returns a new child NSManagedObjectContext.

Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.name: changesCount
Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.abstract: Returns the number of uncommitted changes (transient changes are included).

Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.name: hasPersistentChanges
Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.abstract: Checks whether there are actually changes that will change the persistent store.

Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.name: persistentChangesCount
Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.abstract: Returns the number of changes that will change the persistent store (transient changes are ignored).

Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.name: performSave(after:completion:)
Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.abstract: Asynchronously performs changes and then saves them.

Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.name: performSaveAndWait(after:)
Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.abstract: Synchronously performs changes and then saves them: if the changes fail throwing an execption, the context will be reset.

Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.name: saveOrRollBack()
Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.abstract: Saves the NSManagedObjectContext if changes are present or rollbacks if any error occurs.

Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.name: performAndWaitResult(_:)
Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.abstract: Synchronously performs a given block on the context’s queue and returns the final result.

Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.name: performAndWait(_:)
Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.abstract: Synchronously performs a given block on the context’s queue.

Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.name: performMergeChanges(from:completion:)
Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.abstract: Asynchronously merges the changes specified in a given payload.

Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.name: performAndWaitMergeChanges(from:)
Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.abstract: Synchronously merges the changes specified in a given payload.

Extensions/NSManagedObject.html#/s:So15N.name: hasTemporaryID

Extensions/NSFetchRequestResult.html#/s:.name: materializedObjects(in:where:)
Extensions/NSFetchRequestResult.html#/s:.abstract: Iterates over the context’s registeredObjects set (which contains all managed objects the context currently knows about) until it finds

Extensions/NSFetchRequestResult.html#/s:.abstract: Executes a batch update on the context’s persistent store coordinator.

Extensions/NSBatchUpdateResult.html#/s:S.name: changes

Classes/Transformer.html#/s:12CoreDataPl.name: transformerName
Classes/Transformer.html#/s:12CoreDataPl.abstract: The name of the transformer. It’s used when registering the transformer using Transformer.register().

Classes/CustomTransformer.html#/s:12Core.name: transformerName
Classes/CustomTransformer.html#/s:12Core.abstract: The name of the transformer. It’s used when registering the transformer using DataTransformer.register(transform:reverseTransform:).

Classes/CustomTransformer.html#/s:12Core.abstract: Creates and registers an instance of a DataTransformer.

Classes/MigrationProgressReporter.html#/.name: markAsFinishedIfNeeded()
Classes/MigrationProgressReporter.html#/.abstract: Marks the progress as finished if it’s not already.

Classes/LightweightMigrationManager.html.name: estimatedTime
Classes/LightweightMigrationManager.html.abstract: An estimated interval (with a 10% tolerance) to carry out the migration (default: 60 seconds).

Classes/LightweightMigrationManager.html.name: updateProgressInterval
Classes/LightweightMigrationManager.html.abstract: How often the progress is updated (default: 1 second).

Classes/LightweightMigrationManager.html.name: LightweightMigrationManager
Classes/LightweightMigrationManager.html.abstract: A NSMigrationManager proxy for lightweight migrations with a customizable faking migrationProgress.
